attributes.action: Introduce legislation so that those whose travel plans are put in jeapordy by strike action during public holidays receive full compensation  from the Unions or other bodys and their voting members calling the strike
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Once again the Unite Union is calling out on Strike cabin staff employed by British Airways.
This will impact on the travel plans of the British people, their families, friends and those wanting to travel to and from Great Britain at the busiest times of year.
We understand the right of the unions and their members to strike but why do they have to make an impact at such precious times.
 If such actions are taken during national holidays, then travel plans which are affected during this time should have the liability directly  directed at the responsible parties, the unions and their members and such be legally responsible for the cost of reimbursement to the travelers.
